resources.string: The E.I.T.A! Recife is a program that identifies challenges in the city of Recife and creates an environment conducive to making connections capable of implementing innovative solutions. Aims to obtain innovative solutions for the challenges of the city of Recife, an agency whose main function is to serve the citizen. The process will follow the principles of Open Innovation, covering three macro phases: public challenges, prototyping and minimum viable product development (MVP), in a period of approximately 6 (six) months.

How can we reduce the abandonment of dogs and cats in the city of Recife, identifying and recording each one of them in a scalable way and changing the culture of the population in treating these animals?
